import React from 'react' import "./../css/OrderItem.css"; const OrderItem = ({order}) => { var pending = false if (order.status === "PENDING") pending = true const onChangeStatusClick = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() } const onAcceptClick = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() } const onDeclineClick = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

  • {"Order id: " + order.orderId}

    {"Customer: " + order.customer}

    {order.date + " " + order.time}

  • {order.foods.map((food) => ( food.name + ", " ))}

  • {order.price + " RON"}

  • {order.status}

  • {pending &&
    }
) } export default OrderItem
